key_insights: **Issue**: Rendering Large Lists Directly in JSX
What: Rendering large lists directly in JSX can cause performance bottlenecks.
Why: The browser needs to layout and paint all those elements, which can freeze the UI if done inefficiently.
Fix: Use windowing or virtualization techniques like `react-window` or `react-virtualized`.
Benefit: Only renders a small subset of items at a time, significantly improving performance.
